document.title: Reference for `eif_create'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_cecil. h"
EIF_OBJECT eif_create (EIF_TYPE_ID tid );
2DESCRIPTION The eif_create() function creates an Eiffel object, which type identifier is tid.
2RETURN VALUE It returns an Eiffel object, which is already protected.
2NOTES You cannot pass the return value to Eiffel routines as is: you must call eif_access() to pass it to Eiffel routine. To release the protection of an Eiffel object created with eif_create(), call eif_wean(). It will be collected during the next collection.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 1 and later.
2SEE ALSO
eif_wean(1) , eif_type_id(1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
